title: Drawing, "Antique building"
markings: Verso: Cooper Union Museum for the Arts of Decoration (Lugt#457d)
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Horizontal rectangle. Interior of theater showing arrangement of boxes and decoration of ceiling.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Antique building".
Pen and brown ink. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-159.
